A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Possibly the best Star Wars film I've seen since the 80s.  It's a tad too long but has a lot to explore and unpack in its run time.  Fascinating developments and changes to what has unfortunately come to be expected of the franchise.  Embracing the new while also paying respect to that which has gone before fans\, both new and old could not have asked for a better film in our current milieu.
